markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jungle Runner](/Feats.aspx?ID=4007) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 55</row>

</column>

---

You run through the jungle as easily as you would through an open field. You ignore difficult terrain from underbrush within forests and jungles. You can always use the [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) action when you're within forest or jungle terrain to gain [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459), even if you aren't adjacent to an obstacle you can Take Cover behind.
name: Jungle Runner
